content.detailedDescription: My son and his friends saw these lights in berwyn, also a friend on the south side of chicago saw the same thing,
content.summary: My son witness it and took video but can't upload it.

content.detailedDescription: I went to the end of my driveway to see if rain was coming. there was a thunderstorm nearby. i spotted a small white dot in the clouds to the west. it appeared stationary. it was clearly inside the clouds but could be seen briefly in the open. after a while, i was sure it was a round solid sphere. below its location is a large hospital with a helicopter pad that is frequently used. its not an object i have ever seen in my life however, it could have been a balloon i suppose. it did have an unusually white glow. i lost sight of it as the clouds obstructed the view once again. my gut feeling tells me its there to observe, whether man made or otherwise.
content.summary: It was in the clouds and seemed stationary. it was bright white and round. it did not seem to move. the clouds obstructed the view breifly.

content.detailedDescription: My 25-year old son and myself were outside watching random fireworks, when 4 bright lights appeared in se sky, seemed to hover (was not fireworks, it was almost like whatever it was was watching fireworks,hovered for about 1 minute before moving very slow)then moved east forming into a triangle with one out in front,(could see the individual objests rotating in a circle) went east brfore totally disappearing, watched for about 3-4 minutes. we knew it was something strange, very unique experience that we both saw at the exact same time
content.summary: Saw 4 bright objects in sky form into a triangle and head east at 9:40 pm on july 4th 2014

content.detailedDescription: July 4th 2014. we were in our back yard watching the neighbors fireworks. there were mulitple aircraft in the sky. looking upward to see the arial displays, i noticed a bright orange orb that didn't fall to the ground with the other fireworks. instead it became smaller and slowly travelled ne across the sky behind the trees. minutes later another fiery orange orb appeared in the same location that we had seen the first orb. this time it was slightly larger and appeared to be pulsating or almost flaming. this object moved from its orignal location on an easterly path until it was out of sight. we thought the event was over and began discussing what we had seen. it was defintely not any conventional aircraft, there were no navigation light, no beacons. 5 minutes later another object appears in the southern sky. it again was bright red orange, it slowly made its way east. before the third sighted object was out of sight another orb, same color and intensity, appeared and travelled in the same direction. this time the glowing lights turned off and you could see the objects moving through the sky. the were very pale but you could still see something moving. they eventually moved out of sight and that was the last we saw of them. i wasn't able to get pictures of the first 2 objects but had my phone when the last 1 appeared. when i took pictures my camera flash was activating and i remember thinking oh great, they know where i am, at that i see them. we felt very small watching these objects.
content.summary: Flaming orb slowly flies across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Red bottom, blue green top lights on object hovering over downtown portland during fireworks display. irratic movement in all directions.  disappearing after a few minutes.  observed by 3 people in se portland.
content.summary: Bright red and blue green moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription: In june of 2013 i saw a flaming or glowing large ball moving very slowly from east to west over my house then off to the horizon in the west in the late afternoon . many others saw it in the area that day and it made local news as well as being discussed on coast to coast and ground zero radio shows that night. i didn't think to report the sighting until last night when i saw another unusual object. the object. from last year i had actually seen before in 2000 when i was in the army stationed in bosnia.
content.summary: Glowing ball seen by many

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch watching the 4th of july fireworks in the area when my father and i spotted the object. it had a red glowing upper portion and what looked like a yellow orange fireball underneath. it reminded me of a paper lunch bag. with a candle in it but that's as close as i can relate it to a known object. it flew from north east to south west.. when i first noticed it the object looked about 500 feet away from me and was a couple of hundred feet in the air. it was hard to estimate the size of the object but my father who is a trained pilot estimated it at about 30 feet across. from my vantage point the object appeared to be vertical in shape with the red portion on top. at first i thought it was an errant or stray firework from down the street but i quickly realized it was nothing of the sort. it was moving slowly over the house without changing direction and it made no sound at all.. after it flew slowly over the house it continued in the same direction at the same speed. once it was about a mile past the house it appeared to ascend then it disappeared. later last night. after the sighting i was listening to coast to coast a.M. and a gentleman from south carolina phoned into the radio show at about 4 in the morning to report an identical object he saw there last night flying fro the same direction and flying in the same direction.
content.summary: Ufo flew over house and disappears

content.detailedDescription:
At first the five of us thought it was some kind of a firework display as the fireworks in our area were wrapping up. we were outside cleaning up after shooting off fireworks.  this orange glowing orb was first observed in the north over the subdivision across brownsferry road moving south in a straight line towards us. it traveled over a tree line and then took a hard turn west and then disappeared.  not sure if it accelerated or vanished.  

this object was glowing orange with almost a white edge.  the glowing effect kept us from seeing any hard edge. we all thought it was fireworks at first or even a military drone (i live very near redstone arsenal and msfc)as it travels closer we knew it wasn't a plane, it was way too low. there was no sound st all and this thing was very close to us.......My aerospace engineer boyfriend calculated that it traveled 3 miles in about 10-15 seconds. we've seen drones and they didn't look anything like this!  we had a camera and the batteries were drained when we went to shoot a photo.

too me it looked almost like a plasma ball as it undulated orange white and little bit of red.
content.summary: Observed orange orb-like object moving from north to south, turned due west and took off

content.detailedDescription: After a long night of partying with friends, at aprox 2300 i was taking my dog outside to use the bathroom before bed. i noticed fireworks still going off in the area, when i looked directly west and saw a amber(yellow/orange) light moving just above the tree line. it didn't look like a normal firework. at first i though that maybe it was a flare some drunk had shot off, but it kept going in a straight line. the object appeared to be cigar shaped, only standing up. i tracked it until it went behind a tree, saw it once more when it passed the tree, and then lost sight of it when it went behind a second tree.The light seemed to have a glow around it, likely from all of the smoke from fireworks in the air. the light was constant one color. having worked in aviation for many years, i did not get the fealing this was an aircraft. it was difficult to judge the distance, but appeared to over the missouri/kansas state line, possibly in between belton and martin city. unfortunately i didn't have my phone on me, and my wife had just gone to bed.
content.summary: Amber solid light in sky

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 11:00 pm (7-4-14) over north new jersey i spotted a yellow/orange light traveling from west to east.  it made no noise and there were no blinking lights common to airplanes. it seemed to be traveling faster than airplanes since i see airplanes overhead often. approx. three to four minutes later another similiar object appeared folowing the same path. then another and another at about three to four minute intervals. a total of four similar objects flying alone in the same path. there was a unusual lack of air traffic at the time considering i live near three major airports.  i have never seen lights like this, so i don't think these were airplane.
content.summary: Four yellow/orange lights,no noise flying west to east singly in four minute intervals same path

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, i live in danville, a small town (in many ways) in the west south side of virginia. the streets get quiet very early.
during the last two months at night, i have been seeing flying saucers with bright multicolor lights underneath high up in the ski.
last night after the firework celebration i looked out my window and saw on the opposite side of the overcast ski what appeared to be a black hole. what i saw looked like a grey cloud funnel, three ships, one by one came out of this hole and i could see more lights inside the funnel, like waiting to fly out but the hole closed. i loss sight of the ships when they flew pass mi roof going west.
for some reason i don't get scared or uneasy, it seems very natural to me to witness this, i sense goodness.
content.summary: Last night after firework celebration i looked out my window and saw on the opposite side of the overcast ski what appeared to be a black hole. what i saw looked like a grey cloud funnel, three ships, one by one came out of this hole and i could see m

content.detailedDescription: Observed glowing orange light move from e to se . no sound from object. no blinking lights. did not appear to be airplane or helicopter since no blinking lights or sound. there were fireworks in area but this was after major fireworks shows. light was constant. object was on consistent path for @3 minutes- straight at first but them slowly turned path. did tape event with iphone but there was difficulty in showing point of reference and was unable to zoom in on object .
content.summary: Orange silent object observable for 3 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Quick background, wife is an x-ray tech, i'm former air force that had ts clearance now project implemintation manager. 
last night my wife, 14 year old son and i were in the driveway launching fireworks. we noticed 3 lights in a triangle shape in the distance (few miles away) above the tree line. all three of us started asking out loud "what is that?"  at first we thought they were other fireworks that didn't explode because they had an orange color ( even though fireworks don't really travel high enough to be seen that far away) but these did not go any higher and stayed in a perfect triangle formation. we kept waiting for them to disappear or to flash like aircraft but they stayed in the air in the same place. i believe there were 3 objects because the distance would have made the object massive if it was a single object. my son tried to photograph and could not. he retrieved my phone and it would not capture the light either because of the distance. i switched to movie mode and i thought i did not capture anything but once reviewed i was able to capture the triangle formation for a second and have the picture as proof. 
after a few minutes the left most light disappeared and the other two went higher in the air and disappeared too. my years in the air force and life experience up until now have left me without an explanation. they did not act like 3 aircraft such as helicopters or hot air balloons or even harriers the only manned vehicles i can think of capable of staying perfect shape without moving for that amount of time. at one point i was actually worried (because of my air force background) that it was a missile launch and couldn't tell they were moving because of perspective. they were orange/reddish so i thought rockets going away from us. but as time went on they continued to not move at all. 
the photo attached is a screen shot of the movie. i paused the film and zoomed in. if you look closely you can see 3 dots in a triangle shape.
content.summary: 3 lights in a triangle formation hovered for about 4 min then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On september 24, 2010 i was asleep with my wife and had awakened about 4:00am to use the bathroom. i decided to smoke a cigarette after using the bathroom and proceeded outside to my backyard. as i���m standing in my backyard smoking my cigarette i noticed what appeared to be a single orange light hovering in the sky. i didn���t think anything of it because cleveland hopkins airport is in the direction from which the light was coming; i simply thought it was an airplane. but as the orange light slowly hovered in the direction of my house it changed into multiple lights, still orange in color but illuminating a soft white color from the center of each light. i counted twelve lights hovering along in a horizontal formation; in sync moving as one. and as for how did the formation change occur? imagine you closing your eyes to blink, just a natural blink like all humans do. but the formation change occurred faster than the blinking eye of a human being. i was visually locked in on this object to say the least.

��the lights continued to move in the direction of my house and soon would be literally passing over it. i���m like wow what can these lights possibly be. as the orange lights traveled closer to my house the formation of the 12 orange lights changed to a circular formation, a ring of lights! ��again, the formation change occurred faster than the blinking eye of a human being but i wasn���t blinking. the lights didn���t make a sound of any kind, as if they weren���t there. all outside noises that a person would hear, or any sound whatsoever! period! it was mute. i could hear myself think and that was it. it was as if i and the object were the only two things on this planet. i���m freaking out at this point but at the same time i knew i was witnessing something special. nevertheless, but just as the lights moved in closer i realized the 12 orange lights are part of what appeared to be the bottom of the object. the top of this object had the appearance of a meteor rock and resembled the night sky. it looked like a floating city. ��it had an odd octagon shape, with 12 orange lights underneath it. the texture of the ufo was transparent, meaning i could see through it and see the night sky simultaneously. ��i���m looking at this thing like for real. this can���t be real! 

as i stare in amazement all of a sudden the ufo makes a subtle transformation and becomes more graphic in detail but it still had resemblance of the night sky. the next thing i know the ufo hovers at a stand-still right as it was moments from passing over my house. i mean it literally stopped! it was if the ufo knew i was watching and wanted me to observe. the size of this thing was at least a half mile long or longer; it was enormous. i started thinking that i got to go in the house and get my camera and take a picture of this. but i didn���t want to move and take a chance of the ufo not being in the sky when i returned. i started screaming for my wife to bring me my camera out of my office. baby! baby! bring me my camera out my office! 

nevertheless, due to what i was experiencing at that moment i forgot she was sleeping and its 4:00 am in the morning. so, i had to make a decision. i took a real good look at this ufo in its entirety and locked it in my memory forever, than i ran in the house to get my camera. i came back and i couldn���t believe the object was still there. i aimed my camera up towards the sky and located the ufo thru my camera viewfinder. right before i took a picture i peeked at the ufo one last time with the naked eye. i took the picture and when i took the camera away from my face the ufo was nowhere to be seen. i mean literally gone, nowhere in the sky period. how could something so enormous totally disappear out of the sky from all directions in a matter of two seconds? 

my picture didn���t take properly due to partially dead batteries in my camera. i was very disappointed. during the encounter the ufo didn���t make the slightest sound whatsoever. i mean nothing! literally! all i heard was pure silence. it was like watching the tv with the mute button on. all details of event occurred in a time span of twenty minutes. the ufo i observed is somewhat like the ufo photo below; ufo photo below was retrieved from the ufo evidence website.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange light hovering in the sky at 4:00am in the morning.

content.detailedDescription:
During the fireworks show in hoschton/braselton ga, many witnesses including myself witnessed 1-2 weird red objects zipping and flying around the sky during the entire show, some speculated ufo, others speculated a drone, all i know is that it was really strange and creepy how these two objects moved with no effort.
20 witnesses
content.summary: 2 red, quick and uprupt moving object that blunted orange.

content.detailedDescription:
These three pictures were taken while on a ferryboat in greece about 40 minutes into an hour's trip between the port of rafina and marmari. 

kolpos petalion

38.050803, 24.171313   (exact location on google maps, and camera was facing south)

it was very windy, and the sea was so beautiful, that i decided to go out on deck and take a few pictures to use as background on my desktop at home. the pictures were taken with my htc one x phone.
i never noticed anything odd at the time, but when i got home and put picture # 104 up as background on my 27" screen i saw the black shape protruding from the clouds on the upper right corner. as all three were taken within a few seconds, i looked at the other 2, and it's obvious, whatever this was, was hidden in the clouds since you can still see a small bit of it in pic # 105.
 i honestly don't know what it is. there are no flights over that area, and it's obviously not a helicopter as it was very windy and it wouldn't be hiding in the clouds. 

hopefully with your equipment you'll have some kind of explanation of what this could be.

thanks
content.summary: Pictures were taken while on a ferryboat in greece

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo event over denver tonight around 9:30 at the height of the fireworks. thousands and thousands of ppl witnessed this strange occurrence. glowing white plasma balls danced around the sky. each ball having a sparkling trail. the balls would come together and form one, then divide into 3, 4 or 5 balls and circle about before coming back together to form one once again. this spectacle continued for a length of about 3 minutes. it was astonishing.

you will be able to find lots of video of this on youtube
content.summary: Glowing obects with sparkling trail seen becoming one and then dividing againg

content.detailedDescription: Saw multiple lights hovering around the naborhood, red/orange pulsating lights, where in the air for about 15-20 minutes
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple red lights hovering around

content.detailedDescription:
I live right on the pacific ocean. the 4th of july fireworks are a big deal here and many people spend hundreds of dollars on some pretty impressive fireworks. it's still going as i write this.

i went outside for the second time around 10:30 tonight to video the great fireworks we have here at the beach. i was out earlier and chased back inside by mosquito's as there was virtually no wind at ground level. i saw the red orb and was disappointed i did not have the camera. i pretty much passed it off as it vanished.

the second time i went out, i was trying to gather as much fireworks action as possible and then i saw the "orb" again but this time i was able to get a video of it and also zoom in on it.

this is not a great video as i was moving the camera around fast until we get to the orb which occurs around the 3 minute mark. the red marks on the film are something on the camera. there are two houses in the background and one has a porch light. you can see the windows on the house to the south.  

the orb did not exhibit any distinct motions and then just vanished but, of course, i was looking at the screen on the camera as well.  

i came back in and downloaded the memory card to my computer...I got more excited watching the video and decide to report this. i have not erased the memory card.

if they can make a firework that can hover that long, i would be very surprised. it was not the uscg helicopter that flew by earlier or any aircraft that i know of.

the video seems to show what i would call a ball of fire that i could not see while filming it. the interruptions are the smoke clouds coming from the fireworks show in a se direction.

i've never seen or heard of anything like this and would really like another opinion. 

i consider myself a very good observer.
content.summary: Watching and video filming fireworks at the beach. observed the object twice and was able to get it on video second time.

content.detailedDescription:
We were waiting for fireworks over lake union in seattle. we were on queen anne hill, west of the lake. i saw three distinct orange orbs appear out of nowhere, se of the lake, form a triangle , hover, then form a line..They moved to the right (s) behind a tree then emerged in a line then one was just gone, then the other two disappeared. there were choppers and airplanes around, but not close to the orbs, and these were completely different. no sound, and moved crisply when they changed direction.. they just disappeared.


i told my friend, those are ufo's and he laughed at me but i knew this was something i hadn't seen before. they didn't belong there. i knew i was seeing something strange. i was excited and kind of scared. i was a student pilot some years ago, learned to fly and land a plane. i know what planes are. they just did not behave like a chopper or plane and anyway, they were bright orange and very fast in the way they changed direction, going from a triangular formation, hovered for maybe 40 seconds, formed  a line then, boom one was gone, then the other two.

these were not conventional aircraft and they weren't fireworks. fireworks don't hover, change direction, line up in formation, move slowly across the sky, then disappear. someone said maybe drones, but really? that big, bright, and doing maneuvers? 

what did i see?
content.summary: Three orange orbs apeeared in the distance, made trianglea formation then line then were go

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at fireworks and noticed 4lights  hovering above trees  started  looking through binoculars & saw  lights. my parter who was filming fireworks then yelled into me & said look outside at those lights, i told her i was- she tried to film them but she said they went behind the trees, but what i continued to see is the lights move like a snake downward and lights go out.  the lights went out buy number four (the last one) going out first , then  the third one going out the the second  then the first.  not like how a firework  would go out, the number one light  going out first.  we knew something was odd, so we taped our statement of what we saw and drew a picture tonight i case anything ever came up we would have it documented.  our background in criminal investigation we know documentation is key to everything-even if it was just for our own memories.  i told my son about it when i spoke to him on. the phone tonight.
content.summary: Initially thought was firework while filming but it never exploded have film but not that good

content.detailedDescription:
We were facing the ocean watching fireworks on the beach at westport, wa. at approx. 11 pm we noticed above and behind us a bright, orange-colored orb traveling from north to south. it did not travel at an unusual rate of speed but it also did not display any blinking lights that a small to medium conventional aircraft would have shown at that altitude, which we estimated to be approximately 5,000 feet. if it were a large conventional aircraft, we would have heard engine noise. 

the light traveled steadily for two to three minutes as we captured the image on a cell phone video.  it then seemed to head in a southeasterly direction and disappear. however, within 30 seconds it reappeared brightly at the same position it had been approximately a minute before.  this disappearance and re-appearance was repeated one more time before the object finally faded from view. 

the orb did not resemble any kind of "firework" that i had ever seen.  it was simply too high and glowed too long.  it also did not resemble any of the many small airplanes that i have seen on many a 4th of july night cruising above fireworks displays. those craft were easily identifiable by the position of the blinking lights on the wings and tail. this orb appeared as a solid object and did not blink or pulsate, although a thin, very bright white penumbra appeared to rim the orange light. 

shortly before -- approximately one-half hour -- we noticed the orb, a helicopter showing only a single tail light flew past us from north to south (the same general direction of flight of the orb)over the ocean.
content.summary: Bright orange orb with white light at edges. traveled slowly but backtracked without turning.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend, her son, my mother, and i were just coming home from the fire in the sky fireworks event in downtown columbia missouri when my girlfriend saw something that normally isn't there shortly after 10pm tonight. i looked as we turned the corner into our neighborhood and it appeared to be hovering next to a water tower located maybe 500 feet away from us. none of us knew what it was. it appeared to be a gold or orange like color that gave a bright aura like look to it. we slowly went on until the trees were blocking our view. as we drove on home we saw at least 4 more of them but were slowly moving in that same direction. we got out of the car at home and 3 of the 4 of us stood outside and watched at least 8-10 more traveling in the same direction with a slight curve from southeast to northwest. all of which seemed to be spaced about 20 to 30 seconds apart at the same altitude. these were more of an orange or more red in color. we could see each one as it traveled through the night sky moving to slow to be a helicopter or plane and had no flashing lights. more of a pulsating light instead. now i know this is the 4th of july, but these were not fireworks or flares from a plane! i have no idea what they were or are exactly, but it still has my girlfriend a little freaked out. they made no noise and all we could hear was fireworks. no engine of any kind was heard. i saw another move from east to west just above the trees on the back side of our place and it was much lower than the others. it was a brighter and dark red aura looking disc like object. what was weird is they just seemed to disappear after they went over our entire neighborhood. but that was only after traveling i don't know how many miles. each object we could see for a good 2-3 minutes before they just vanished. but i know these were not fireworks or flares! my girlfriend did get some video of them with her cell phone, but she was very shaken and couldn't stand still. we could see a jet way off in the distance but they did not come from a jet or airplane. surely we were not the only ones to see these things traveling so low and so slow tonight. the videos have been attached.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw multiple orb like floating then moving orange and/or red lights moving from south east to north west. one from east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I and hundreds of other people were watching fourth of july firework when i and others saw a circle shaped craft with red blue green plusating lights above the fire works it hoverd for about a minute then darted to the right and then slowly came back and hover again.The it suddenly started plusating white light rappedly before going back to the other colors. then it stared slowly flying south until i could not see it. then i started watching the fire works agian about a minute later another man taped my shoulder and told me to look up its back as the fire works got really intense. then agin it slowly just flew south until i didnt see it anymore. what i got from this strange but exciting event was that i think the ufo was drawn to the fire works and so how when it started rappedly plusating white light i beleve it was trying to communcate. i video taped the whole event.Ps i have the video but dont know how to up load it.
content.summary: Circle shape with red blue green plusating lights.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i invited his mother and 3 friends over to light off fireworks in our front yard for 4th of july. after we had completed our show i went into the house for 5 minutes to attend to one of our children and when i returned my husband our 3 friends and his mother told me what i had missed in the sky while i was gone. they had viewed an oval shaped white with a slightly green tint object cross the sky at an extremely fast, yet not shooting rate of speed north west to north east at about a 55-60 degree angle at 10:45pm lasting for a 15 second duration. considering that i am a mufon field investigator my husband was very enthused that i missed the occurrence, my mother-in-law and friends were very excited after learning about my involvement with mufon and i was very agitated at my husband, because my camera was right there freaking right there in a chair beside of him. i asked them questions and continued to discuss what happened while in discussion my husband, mother-in-law, and friends continued pointing in the sky at star-like ufo's travelling at high rates of speed, flashing, one moving erratically in circles and another moving, hovering and then moving. within the course of 55 minutes i observed a total of 5 star ufo phenomena 6 were observed with the largest initial oval sighting. my husband was a flight operations specialist in the army we both worked on an airfield, however my mos was not in aviation and he stated the objects observed were way above mach 3 or any speed he has ever seen. the first two star objects were observed at 45 degrees directly north passing directly along side one another the left moving nnw to sse the second sse to nnw for a duration of 15-20 seconds. after this sighting a few minutes past 11pm there was a third star like object 65 degrees north east circling in a small penny sized pattern clockwise my friends comment "like a mosquito" for a duration of about 30 seconds then slowly faded. the fourth star object i observed at an estimated time of 11:20 moved slowly from sse to nnw from 90 degrees to 75 degrees and then shot just like a meteor viewed in a shower to 40 degrees nnw. the last object observed for a duration of 15 minutes between 11:30 and 11:45 was like a star moving in the north east from 75 degrees to 60 degrees and back again  flashing occasionally in an erratic pattern as if it were signaling, then staying stationary, moving slowly again from one position to another, fading out, fading back in and flashing during the time observed. i attempted to video record some of the phenomena, but the objects were too small for camera on video recording. when i took pictures a sequence of stars forming a triangle pattern appeared on camera that was not viewed by naked eye. i had problems with the operation of my camera during the 55 minutes of siting. the camera kept on displaying full memory capacity, when i did not have very many pictures stored. after i deleted some pictures and videos off of my camera i still had the "memory too full" display and finally i had a window where i could record video, unfortunately that did not come out, but the pictures i took did with the unusual triangle pattern. whether or not i had actually captured something in the sky or light reflection i do not know. mysteriously the pictures jumped in sequence skipping 041 and 042 as if i had never taken the photographs or deleted them off of the camera.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval shaped white/green ufo observed by 5 witnesses crossing the sky from nw to ne at high altitude at high speed slightly smaller than aspirin, multiple star-like ufo sightings 6 witnesses of irregular movement and flashing for 50 min after sighting

content.detailedDescription:
We were lighting fireworks, enjoying the fourth of july holiday when the object was spotted in the sky by my girlfriend's father directly west. at first we thought it was a drone but it seemed to high up to be a plane or drone. in addition, when we got a better view of the object it had the distinct shape of a disc. on the first pass of the object i grabbed my cell phone and recorded the object. my feeling was one of curiosity, excitement, and a touch of fear. it hovered then headed north and disappeared in the clouds. i have the videos posted on youtube and can provide the link. 

((i tried to upload the videos to the mufon website twice and it timed out so i will not include them)) 

it then came around for a second pass about ten minutes later. i recorded it again with my phone and we also had the opportunity to view it through some high-powered hunting binoculars. whilst viewing it through the binoculars you could definitely tell it was disc shaped with a very distinct circular outline. it flew in a similar pattern as the first pass, disappearing in the northern sky in the clouds.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in sky. west jordan, utah - united states - on 07/04/2014 @ 21:51

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were returning from an independence day celebration at our church.  i was driving west along hwy 99, and was almost at the town limits of rockvale, when out of my driver's side window i observed three orange/yellow lights at the 11o'clock position at a distance of approximately a half a mile.  the lights were arranged in an echelon pattern with the lowest of the three to the southeast.  my first thought was that they were aircraft warning beacons atop communication towers, but then i realized that they were the wrong color and too bright, and to add to it i live less than two miles from the area, and had never witnessed them there before.  i said to my wife, who was in the passenger seat, "hey, those are new".  she replied that they were what i had thought, tower lights, but after she spoke, we entered the town limits, and turned slightly westward, and behind the dollar general store, it then became very obvious that they were not tower lights.  the original three were now joined by at least four more behind them in what i would describe as a wedge formation.  the first three were maintaining an echelon formation.  my thoughts now moved towards military helicopters on night maneuvers, as we do see them here frequently.  their size and movement was similar to a hughes 500, but there were no flashing arial beacons visible.  i nearly ran off the road straining to see them, so i pulled off  onto the shoulder and rolled my window down to see if i could hear anything.  there was absolutely no sound.  the car behind us also saw them, as he slowed to a near stop and was looking up as he drove by.  the objects never displayed a solid form, but seemed to produce a red/orange/yellow light from within that seemed to flicker.  were it not for their speed and direction, i may have thought that they were lanterns that had been released in honor of the country's birthday.  i estimate that their speed was between 60 to 100 mph, and they turned westward to parallel the highway just to its south.  the wind was coming in from the southwest.  any illusion that these objects were being carried by the wind was further dissolved when one made a 180 degree turn to the south and disappeared.  i was not in a very safe spot on the side of the road, so i drove about a quarter mile to the entrance of the local elementary school, and we all observed them there moving to the west still, but then abruptly disappearing one by one in the same point in the sky, with the exception of the trail object that faded to near extinction, the re-emerged to its original intensity twice before finally disappearing.  i have a strong military background, and have seen virtually every type of aircraft in service today operate at night, and i have absolutely no idea what these objects were.
content.summary: Multiple lights moving against the wind approx. 100 mph without sound, that did not display any flashing beacons

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from the store watching firework. that is when i noticed 4 lights over the buildings in downtown denver. at first i thought that it was a little weird. i kept walking west on colfax looking over my shoulder. then i saw them start blinking. one after the other. one would blink off and stay off for about 5 seconds then another would blink off. after about 10 total seconds it would turn back on. so i ran back home to show somebody because i did not have my phone to take a picture and i knew that nobody would believe me. i saw a pedestrian and showed him. he thought that it was weird. so i started running again. i turned the corner and looked back so i looked east, it was still there. when i got home and got my girlfriend to come outside to look. it was gone. it would have been about 10 minutes that i had seen this going on. it was about 9:30 in the evening. i know what i saw. i am not crazy. thanks for listening. july 4th 2014 9:30 pm.
content.summary: 4 lights. 1 blink off the a nother blink off then all 4 on. hovering. long oval like object from left to right.

content.detailedDescription:
We were lighting fireworks in the front yard, it was exactly 9:50 pm (mst) when my girlfriends daughter pointed out the object in the sky approaching us from the west. he commented that it was a "drone." however, as it got closer it was obvious it wasn't a drone due to how high in the sky it was. on the first pass i managed to grab my cell phone and zoom in on the object. my reaction was one of curiosity and excitement. it lazily hovered near our location then flew north and disappeared behind the clouds. 

the object then appeared for a second pass. one of the guys in our group had some high powered hunting binoculars and we were able to view the object pretty clearly this time. it was distinctly circular and glowing a reddish white. it followed a similar path then got lost behind the clouds.
content.summary: Glowing red disk over the west jordan, utah sky on july 4th, 2014.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fireworks from balcony around 2145. husband noticed a light thought it was fireworks then looked away not thinking about it. he looked back after about a minute and one light was still there in the same spot then the one light turned into 4. the lights spun around in one full circle rotation and turned into 3 lights which is when i noticed them. the 3 lights were just over the tree line and were flying toward us for about 5 seconds. as they were flying toward us in a straight line i got dizzy and started having full body chills. the 3 lights turned back to one light and fell straight down and disappeared. it just dropped from the sky.That's all we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: One orb orb turned to multiple, changed shape, flew in circles, back to one, dropped down
